descriptionHtml:
Your follower keep getting lost in the woods? Want to revisit that little grove, but it is not marked on map? Or maybe you suspect your wife is cheating with this pesky Faendall? Then this mod is for you.

It adds 10 gems and quest that tracks their location. You can give them to followers, reverse pickpocket to NPC\'s or drop on the ground. Location will be shown on your map when you activate \"Markers\" quest from journal.
Quest is started by picking \"Marker One\" (it is located in the satchel at Faendall\'s camp, near Riverwood, along with rest of the markers)

Featured on [b]skyrimgems[/b]!
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]
Category 110 - UI - Map
author: DarkPhoenix
